actions.name: createConversationWithSingleAgent
actions.description: Create a new conversation with a specific Agent by ID.

actions.name: find_conversation
actions.description: Looks up an existing conversation by Agent ID (optionally by conversation ID or Name).

actions.name: find_message
actions.description: Searches for a specific message by ID (or searches text within messages) inside a conversation.

actions.name: search_agents
actions.description: Find agents by name or ID using search filters.

actions.name: sendMessageToExistingConversation
actions.description: Send a message to an existing conversation with an agent.

triggers.name: new_agent
triggers.description: Triggers when a new AgentX agent is created.

triggers.name: new_conversation
triggers.description: Triggers when a new conversation begins with a specific Agent. Only detects conversations created after the trigger is enabled.
